about_the_game:
a 2D hack n smash with Metroidvania features, mainly focusing on the Stylish Combo combat,

with simple combination of button press to perform difference Assault-Skill,

no complex command-input is needed, but still able to create your own style combo!

build the play style by the choosing the Sub-Gadget , passive Equipment and the level adjustable Assault-Skill.

Game Features

  • Suffering of too few Teleport point ?? no , we got stage selection

  • Metroidvania inspired, but with a bit twisted

  • With the features of metroidvania, instead of interconnected 1 huge map, it separated by 8  Island and each Island got more than 1 area for you to discover,

  •  Decrease the time for back-tracking in huge map running or the suffer of lack of Teleport point.

  • Separated some game content which not everyone enjoyed such as "death chasing" / "the precise jumping" to Challenge Mission, which is not blocking to the main mission.

Beating all the Enemy by your Morphose Arms!!

Once you are skilled , preform stylish Combo! Mixing basic Attack and Assault-Skill , do your crazy Combo !

Breaking Enemy`s Armor-Bar and do your Combos!!

Tactically break the Armor bar, stylishly do the Combo !

Utilizing Sub-Gadget to assist your perform

Up to 4 Sub-Gadget you can equip on each time you go into the battle area

Various type of Sub-Gadget for various usage , Attack assist / distract enemy / Blocking/ Countering/ Healing…etc

Skilled-player can mix it into your combo!

Follow Twitter to get the most update information !!

Many new information and feature will announce at Twitter once it done .
